original_text: And I am very sore displeased with the heathen that are at ease: for I was but a little displeased, and they helped forward the affliction.
korean_text: 안일한 여러 나라들 때문에 심히 진노하나니 나는 조금 노하였거늘 그들은 힘을 내어 고난을 더하였음이라

sentences.original_text: And I am very sore displeased
with the heathen that are at ease:
for I was but a little displeased,
and they helped forward the affliction.
